# init(_:isIncluded:marketingContent:) | Apple Developer Documentation

-  init(_:isIncluded:marketingContent:) 

Initializer# init(_:isIncluded:marketingContent:)

StoreKitSwiftUIiOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+watchOS 11.0+

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
init(
    _ label: some StringProtocol,
    isIncluded: @escaping (Product) -> Bool,
    @ViewBuilder marketingContent: () -> MarketingContent
) where Content == Never
```

Available when `Content` conforms to `StoreContent`, `Label` is `Text`, and `MarketingContent` conforms to `View`.## [See Also](/documentation/storekit/subscriptionoptiongroup/init(_:isincluded:marketingcontent:)-4d72a#see-also)
